name: HousingInstabilityGoals
title: Housing Instability Goals
description: There are currently no existing domain specific LOINC codes for housing instability. That value set will be added to this group once it is available.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> 
The value sets in this group represent the goals associated with Housing Instability as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of goal.description),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT goals that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

contains.display: Coordination of resources to address housing instability (procedure)
